plot: Peter and Ellen are on trial for obscenity. The prosecution shows pieces of their allegedly obscene movie. Witnesses relate events during the production.
title: On Trial Part 2: Oral Arguments
plot_es: Peter and Ellen are on trial for obscenity. The prosecution shows pieces of their allegedly obscene movie. Witnesses relate events during the production.
